bibl.title: Greek Ostraca from Abu Mina (O.AbuMina). (ArchPF. Beiheft 25.)
bibl.note: O. Abu Mina 1-1446. - General Introduction. Abu Mina. - The ostraca archive [first half of the seventh century A.D.]. - The texts: I. Sub-literary texts?; - II. Writing on flask; - III. Notations on vessels; - IV. Designs and Drawings; - V. Exercise; - VI. Records. - Edition of the texts: Nos 1-1088. - Descripta A (N.L.): Nos 1089-1107. - Descripta B (Patrick ROBINSON and Georgina FANTONI): Nos 1108-1446. - Concordance. Bibliography. Indices.
